title: Kooij Second in Kuurne: Silver Lining or Warning Sign for Visma?
content:
Second to an unstoppable Philipsen helped save 'Opening Weekend' for Visma: 'I was in the right position but missed the final kick.'

Read the full article at Kooij Second in Kuurne: Silver Lining or Warning Sign for Visma? on Velo.
author: ahood
